GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
iommu/fsl_pamu: Fix resource leak in fsl_pamu_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 0d240ac0e4c35d3f64fc782c11433138c1bd016e, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit 695093e38c3ef63fcb43a2840ed865efa20671d5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: iommu/fsl_pamu: Fix resource leak in fsl_pamu_probe()
